patterns: My docking station is not working
Why is my docking station not working
responses: Please turn the docking station on and then off again. After this please take the plug out and put it in the socket again.

patterns: Why is my screen the wrong way around?
responses: Please access the settings tab, then system > display the set the display orientation to landscape

patterns: How to connect my personal device to the wifi?
connect my phone to the wifi
responses: Please visit this link for help with connecting your personal device to our Wifi

patterns: My laptop is not turning on
responses: Please hold the power down for an extended period of time, it should turn on after this.
Press the CTRL+ALT+DELETE buttons together which will pop up the task manager, please close the outlook tab which should close the app. Otherwise please restart your laptop.
